name: Simplifi
0:
”Alexa, ask Simplifi Remote is the door open or shut?”
”Alexa, ask Simplifi Remote how many lights are on?”
”Alexa, tell Simplifi Remote it's too bright.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simplify remote
des: The Simplifi Alexa skill allows users to tie Simplifi's universal device translation service to Alexa. Users can control their devices under Simplifi using Alexa's voice features.
